text: Sure <@U05GHSN593Q> - will send some applications your way but it will need to be in 2 weeks as I’m of from this Wednesday
No problem, thanks for letting me know.

Hello, we are searching for help creating a custom and dynamic landing page for our new product. Here is some <https://www.harvey.ai/|inspiration> for what we’re looking for. Thanks in advance for any introductions and inquiries!

We have excellent experience with creating custom and dynamic landing pages.  Please check our work history  <https://www.oappsit.com/portfolio/> and HubSpot profile <https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/solutions/hub-devs>
